Welcome to my portfolio site!

Hi there! I am Alberto, a Costa Rica-based children's illustrator, graphic designer, web front end and User Experience developer. Alzamon is the artistic pseudonym I've adopted, composed from fragments of my full name. In this portfolio site I have gathered my best illustration work and comics for kids I've done over the years along with a Sketchbook section and some articles that I write from time to time. I am currently looking for agent representation.
